tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PolicyHolders (
    holder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT,
    holder_name VARCHAR(255),
    holder_address TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES PolicyCoverageDetails(policy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE coverage_limits (
  limit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  coverage_type_id INT,
  min_limit DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  max_limit DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (coverage_type_id) REFERENCES coverage_type(coverage_type_id)
);

CREATE TABLE policy_details (
  policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  coverage_type_id INT,
  premium_id INT,
  limit_id INT,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (coverage_type_id) REFERENCES coverage_type(coverage_type_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (premium_id) REFERENCES premium_amount(premium_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (limit_id) REFERENCES coverage_limits(limit_id)
);
